import ScalableUnits from './ScalableUnits?dev-site-examples';

# Scalable Units

<Notice variant="important" ariaLevel="3">

The supported units for width properties are `px`, `em`, and `rem`. 
Ensure that the width units are consistent across all properties in the same component. The width properties are
[columnMinimumWidth](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about#compact-interactive-list-props-table), 
[columnMaximumWidth](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about#compact-interactive-list-props-table), 
[width](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about#column), 
[minimumWidth](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about#column), and 
[maximumWidth](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about#column).
Any width units inconsistent with the rest of the component properties are disregarded.

</Notice>

### Description

This example demonstrates a [Compact Interactive List](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about) component placed in a container with fontSize set to **1.2em** and [width](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about#column) properties set in units relative to the font size. 

<ScalableUnits />
